snippet: Metropolitan Diary: After losing one’s lease, reflecting on a beloved box of brick and crumbling asbestos, with little sunlight, but memories of all-nighters, young angst and dancing.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: After losing one’s lease, reflecting on a beloved box of brick and crumbling asbestos, with little sunlight, but memories of all-nighters, young angst and dancing.

headline.main: In Love With a Rundown Apartment
